item.title: 317 help rsps
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“lordlogic, post:1, topic:543623”]Error trying to run server

Souce Folder - http://prntscr.com/3p6eo9

willing to pay

skype kyle_rosewall[/quote]

It’s saying that it cannot connect to MySQL, which is a database. If you do not have it installed, I suggest using a different source, however if you are up to it you can remove the MySQL compatibility and have the server save data to text files or xml files et cetera.

Read full topic
